duties_responsibilities.duty: Providing outstanding customer service and engaging customers warmly and with a smile.
Supporting the store to meet or exceed its customer service goals.
Handling each customer transaction in a professional and friendly manner.
Using suggestive selling techniques with all customers.
Using digital technology to enhance the customer shopping experience.
Meeting or exceeding personal sales per hour goals.
Working with co-workers, customers, and managers to accomplish defined tasks.
Maintaining floor and stock areas consistent with store standards.
Following procedures for all systems including counts, markdowns, re-tickets and inventory control.
Accepting additional duties or sharing responsibilities during busy times.

education_certification.credential: No education requirement. Experience in retail preferred
